Name: Zed
AbilityDescription:
Zed teleports behind his target and marks them for death, shredding armor for a few seconds. He then enters an Empowered Kill Mode for a few seconds. While active, Zed's attacks deal an additional bouns physical damage and every third attack damages all adjacent enemies, dealing physical damage to adjacent enemies. 

Armor Shred : 15 / 20 / 50

Bonus Damage : 30 / 45 / 120

Duration : 6 / 6 / 15
